attributes.action: Not sign the Declaration on the Future of Europe without a referendum.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britian should not enter the European Constitution without Mr Blair consulting the future Prime Minister and, more importantly, the Citizens of this Country.  Britain will lose its identity and will have no power to veto decisions made by a reformed European parliament.  Once the Declaration on the Future of Europe is signed, there will be no turning back & no room for renegotiation on any Eurpoean treaties.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
